title: Silk Release Configuration
description: Configuration file for Silk release workflow. The action searches for this config in order: (1) .github/silk-release.json in your repo, (2) SILK_RELEASE_SBOM_TEMPLATE environment variable (from repo or org variable).

$schema.description: JSON Schema reference for IDE support

SBOMMetadataConfig.description: SBOM metadata configuration for NTIA-compliant SBOM generation. Values are merged with auto-inferred data from package.json (config takes precedence).

publisher.description: Publisher name for component metadata. Defaults to supplier.name or author from package.json if not specified.

documentationUrl.description: Documentation URL. Overrides homepage from package.json.

SBOMSupplierConfig.description: Supplier information for SBOM metadata. Required for NTIA minimum elements compliance.

name.description: Organization or company name. Required for NTIA compliance.

contact.description: Contact information. Security contact is recommended.

SBOMContact.description: Contact information for supplier or security

holder.description: Copyright holder name. Defaults to supplier.name if not specified.

startYear.description: Copyright start year. Auto-detected from npm registry (first publish date) if not specified.
